# headerHeight

**Instance Property**

The height of the page header.

## Declaration

```swift
var headerHeight: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

The header is measured in points from the top of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintPageRenderer/printableRect] and is above the content area. The default header height is 0.0.

## Specifying header and footer heights

- **footerHeight**: The height of the page footer.

items.description: The height of the page footer.
